name: Bang Bang Cauliflower
description: Crunchy coated cauliflower wings are fried, then drizzled in a sweet and spicy sauce to make this life-changing Bang Bang Cauliflower. Easy to fry, bake in the oven, or cook in an air fryer!
recipeIngredient: 4 cups cornflakes, processed to fine crumbs

itemListElement.text: In a small bowl, whisk together all sauce ingredients until combined. Refrigerate until ready to use.
itemListElement.name: In a small bowl, whisk together all sauce ingredients until combined. Refrigerate until ready to use.

itemListElement.text: Cut the cauliflower into bite sized pieces.
itemListElement.name: Cut the cauliflower into bite sized pieces.

itemListElement.text: In a large bowl, add the soy milk and vinegar and let sit for 1 minute to curdle. Now add the flour, cornstarch, garlic powder, onion powder and salt. Whisk until well combined.
itemListElement.name: In a large bowl, add the soy milk and vinegar and let sit for 1 minute to curdle. Now add the flour, cornstarch, garlic powder, onion powder and salt. Whisk until well combined.

itemListElement.text: Add the cauliflower to the bowl with the wet batter and toss to combine and coat each piece of cauliflower. Add the cornflake crumbs to the bowl and mix to coat the cauliflower.
itemListElement.name: Add the cauliflower to the bowl with the wet batter and toss to combine and coat each piece of cauliflower. Add the cornflake crumbs to the bowl and mix to coat the cauliflower.

itemListElement.text: Add about 1/2 inch of oil in a large skillet and heat over medium-high heat. Make sure to use an oil safe for high temperatures, such as vegetable or peanut oil.
itemListElement.name: Add about 1/2 inch of oil in a large skillet and heat over medium-high heat. Make sure to use an oil safe for high temperatures, such as vegetable or peanut oil.

itemListElement.text: Fry a single layer of cauliflower at a time for about 3 minutes on each side until golden and crispy. Place cooked florets on a paper towel lined plate while you cook the rest in batches.
itemListElement.name: Fry a single layer of cauliflower at a time for about 3 minutes on each side until golden and crispy. Place cooked florets on a paper towel lined plate while you cook the rest in batches.

itemListElement.text: Once they're all fried, drizzle with the bang bang sauce and serve immediately.
itemListElement.name: Once they're all fried, drizzle with the bang bang sauce and serve immediately.

itemListElement.text: Place the cauliflower on a large greased baking sheet and spray with oil. Bake for 30-35 minutes at 425 degrees F, flipping halfway through.
itemListElement.name: Place the cauliflower on a large greased baking sheet and spray with oil. Bake for 30-35 minutes at 425 degrees F, flipping halfway through.

itemListElement.text: Drizzle with sauce and serve immediately.
itemListElement.name: Drizzle with sauce and serve immediately.

itemListElement.text: Add the coated cauliflower in a single layer (work in batches) to the air fryer and cook for 15-25 minutes at 400 degrees F until crispy. Drizzle with sauce and serve.
itemListElement.name: Add the coated cauliflower in a single layer (work in batches) to the air fryer and cook for 15-25 minutes at 400 degrees F until crispy. Drizzle with sauce and serve.
